# Beyond the Cosmic Horizon
## Scripture
"The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands." - Psalm 19:1

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we're reminded of the vastness of God's creation. The stars, planets, and galaxies stretch out before us like an endless canvas, each one a testament to God's infinite power and wisdom. Yet, despite the enormity of the universe, we're not just tiny, insignificant specks in the grand scheme. We're beloved children of God, created in His image and precious in His sight. As we ponder the mysteries of the cosmos, we're drawn to the One who holds it all together. The universe declares God's glory, and in its beauty, we find a reflection of His character.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we look out into the vast expanse of Your creation, we're humbled by Your greatness and amazed by Your love. Help us to see beyond the cosmic horizon, to the eternal purposes that You have for us. May the beauty of the night sky inspire us to worship You, and may the vastness of the universe remind us of Your infinite nature. Thank You for being our guiding star, our constant companion in the journey of life. Shine Your light in our hearts, and may we reflect Your glory to a world in need of Your love.
